mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.text text, a.video_url video_url, a.user_id user_id, a.create_time create_time, i.image_url i_image_url FROM article a LEFT JOIN image i ON a.id = i.article_id

SELECT t.id, t.text, t.video_url, t.create_time, t.u_id, t.u_name, t.u_avatar_url, i.image_url i_image_url FROM( SELECT a.id id, a.text text, a.video_url video_url, a.create_time create_time, u.id u_id, u.`name` u_name, u.avatar_url u_avatar_url FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} LIMIT #{offSet},#{limit}) AS t LEFT JOIN image i ON t.id = i.article_id

SELECT t.id, t.text, t.video_url, t.create_time, t.u_id, t.u_name, t.u_avatar_url, i.image_url i_image_url FROM( SELECT a.id id, a.text text, a.video_url video_url, a.create_time create_time, u.id u_id, u.`name` u_name, u.avatar_url u_avatar_url, l.id l_id FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `like` l ON a.id = l.article_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l_id DESC LIMIT #{offSet},#{limit}) AS t LEFT JOIN image i ON t.id = i.article_id ORDER BY l_id DESC

SELECT t.id, t.text, t.video_url, t.create_time, t.u_id, t.u_name, t.u_avatar_url, i.image_url i_image_url FROM( SELECT a.id id, a.text text, a.video_url video_url, a.create_time create_time, u.id u_id, u.`name` u_name, u.avatar_url u_avatar_url, MAX(c.id) c_id FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `comment` c ON a.id = c.article_id WHERE c.from_user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY c_id DESC LIMIT #{offSet},#{limit}) AS t LEFT JOIN image i ON t.id = i.article_id ORDER BY c_id DESC

SELECT t.id, t.text, t.video_url, t.create_time, t.u_id, t.u_name, t.u_avatar_url, i.image_url i_image_url FROM( SELECT a.id id, a.text text, a.video_url video_url, a.create_time create_time, u.id u_id, u.`name` u_name, u.avatar_url u_avatar_url, b.id b_id FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON a.id = b.article_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b_id DESC LIMIT #{offSet},#{limit}) AS t LEFT JOIN image i ON t.id = i.article_id ORDER BY b_id DESC

SELECT t.id, t.text, t.video_url, t.create_time, t.u_id, t.u_name, t.u_avatar_url, i.image_url i_image_url FROM( SELECT a.id id, a.text text, a.video_url video_url, a.create_time create_time, u.id u_id, u.`name` u_name, u.avatar_url u_avatar_url, b.id b_id FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN browser_history b ON a.id = b.article_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b_id DESC LIMIT #{offSet},#{limit}) AS t LEFT JOIN image i ON t.id = i.article_id ORDER BY b_id DESC
